item.title: Introducing Kueppo!
item.description: Hello there! you can call me Kueppo though I’m mostly known on the internet as @tcheukueppo so, call me as such if you really like to. I live in Africa/cameroon. Just like any geek out there, I spent most of my time writing code and administering open source operating systems because why not? :). To know how much I can be of interest to you, see the list of my open source projects and also checkout my blog because some of the content are quite good. I’m a polyglot programmer. I’ve worked with C, Perl, Sh, Go, Rust, Lua, and Python.
